column1: Little Goat Diner////The Bull's Eye French toast is amazing!  I completely forgot that this dish was served with egg
column2: and was pleasantly surprised when I cut into the thick
column4: and discovered the egg had been cooked inside the French toast.  The French toast was topped with crispy chicken and BBQ maple syrup.  The portions are perfect
column5: I didn't leave feeling hungry OR overstuffed.
